participant_1.background:
I'm a private person and don't like to talk about my family.
i am skilled in computer repair.
I sometimes get a little too nostalgic when I think about my childhood.
I am happy with my casual style that is easy to keep up with a long commute.
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.

I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.

content.text: Not too bad! I'm working on some music production. What are you up to?
I'm just hanging out, listening to some death metal.
Cool! I love metal too. Do you have any bands you like?
I like a lot of different bands, but I'm really into Cannibal Corpse right now.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a death metal band. They're pretty heavy, but I like it.
I'm not sure if I'm ready for that kind of metal yet, but I'll give them a try.
I will! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, go to concerts, and hang out with my friends.
I like all of those things too! I'm a big fan of video games.
What are some of your favorite games?
I like a lot of different games, but I'm really into role-playing games right now.
I've never played a role-playing game before. What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! You create a character and go on adventures with your friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great way to relax and have fun.
